casebody.data:
State
v.
Marvin Wade Millsaps 374P13-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Ms. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina. Mr. Marvin W. Millsaps, Nashville, Pro Se. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of October 2016 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016." Ervin, J. recused
